channel.title: Installation & settings on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Installation & settings on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Installation
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Install the zip The module is correctly installed Uninstall the module The module is correctly uninstalled Install a previous version of the module. Update the module The module is correctly updated

item.title: Wording and statistics
item.description: Steps Step Description Expected result Login in the backoffice. Go to the module’s settings page. Click on the Configuration" tab" Settings page is displayed correctly Change every wording for every language Save Settings are saved successfully Go to the front office and check all the wordings : name of the wishlist. title of the Add to". name of the “Create new” in every language" Wordings are correct Login in the backoffice.
